search.query: index=$index$ |fields src_ip | dedup src_ip
index=$index$ $ua_filter$ |fields http_user_agent | dedup http_user_agent | sort http_user_agent
index=$index$ | fillnull value="N/A" user |fields user | dedup user | sort user
index=notable_events orig_sourcetype=gcp:audit |fields source | dedup source | sort source

index=$index$ $text_filter$ $ua_filter$ src_ip IN ( $clientip$ ) http_user_agent IN ( $useragent$ ) | fields src_ip http_user_agent | iplocation src_ip | geostats latfield=lat longfield=lon count by src_ip

index=notable_events $text_filter$ $ua_filter$ sourceIPAddress IN ( $clientip$ ) userAgent IN ( $useragent$ ) eventType IN ( $eventType$ ) eventSource IN ( $eventSource$ ) eventName IN ( $eventName$ ) awsRegion IN ( $awsRegion$ ) eventCategory IN ( $eventCategory$ ) source IN ( $source$ ) | fillnull value="N/A" userIdentity.userName | search userIdentity.userName IN ( $username$ ) | fillnull value="Success" errorCode | search errorCode IN ( $errorCode$ ) | stats count by source

table.title: click on an eventID to drilldown into the event

search.query: index=$index$ $text_filter$ $ua_filter$ sourceIPAddress IN ( $clientip$ ) userAgent IN ( $useragent$ ) eventType IN ( $eventType$ ) eventSource IN ( $eventSource$ ) eventName IN ( $eventName$ ) awsRegion IN ( $awsRegion$ ) eventCategory IN ( $eventCategory$ ) source IN ( $source$ ) | fillnull value="N/A" userIdentity.userName | search userIdentity.userName IN ( $username$ ) | fillnull value="Success" errorCode | search errorCode IN ( $errorCode$ ) | table _time source sourceIPAddress userAgent userIdentity.userName awsRegion eventSource eventType eventName errorCode eventID
index=$index$ $show_event$ source IN ( $source$ ) | table _time source _raw
